author: ddas

author: ddas
msg: HDFS-1201. The HDFS component for HADOOP-6632. Contributed by Kan Zhang & Jitendra Pandey.

author: ddas
msg: HADOOP-6632. Adds support for using different keytabs for different servers in a Hadoop cluster. In the earier implementation, all servers of a certain type \(like TaskTracker\), would have the same keytab and the same principal. Now the principal name is a pattern that has _HOST in it. Contributed by Kan Zhang & Jitendra Pandey.
